long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Home of Friendly Service! 
With over 15 years of proudly serving Savannah and the surrounding area, Coastal Finance Company offers installment loans to help get you the money you need when you need it. We are committed to giving you the customer service you expect and deserve as a client of Coastal Finance Company.
Customized Loans to Meet Your Needs!
We make loans for any good reason with payments you can afford. Apply online, by phone, or visit us today!
